CAR324H1-F-20225.courseTitle: Capitalism and Crisis in the Caribbean
CAR324H1-F-20225.courseDescription: This upper level course examines the interplay between wider global processes and intra-regional responses that together help shape contemporary Caribbean realities. Topics include: economic crisis and structural adjustment; tourism; the agricultural sector; the Caribbean Single Market and Economy; migration and diaspora.

LEC-0101.meetingStatusNotes:
March 16, 2022: Course moved from S to F Term.
April 1, 2022: Course Cancelled.
